Summary: Triangle shape object in Houston, TX
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving near Studewood park, and glanced up and seen a huge triage shape object in the air. It was up in the air like 50 ft away from me. It just sat still in the air. You could see smoke from the two ends of the triangle in the bottom.. I never believed in UFO, but I know that it had to be one...
trends: There have been 173 other sightings in Houston
There was one other sighting in Houston on or around January 29th 2012
